extendedInfo.description: Adjust your home's temperature settings anytime, anywhere. We give you the convenience to remotely control your heating, cooling, and to turn your fan on or off. There's also a 'Set Away' feature for when you're leaving your home for an extended period of time to save you additional money on your energy bill. Otherwise, just sit back, relax, and let EcoFactor save you money on your monthly energy bill while keeping your comfortable - automatically.The EcoFactor home energy savings service is currently available through the Reliant e-Sense Ideal Temp service, the NV Energy mPowered service, and the SMUD (Sacramento Utility District) energy insights program. Additional service providers are being added all the time; go to www.ecofactor.com to see the latest providers in your area.After loading the application, log in using the same email address and password you use for the EcoFactor web portal.

reviews.title: Great Looking app. Bug in 4.2.2.
reviews.comment: I have two VZW Galaxy Nexus phones, the app works great on the phone running 4.1.2.  However, on the 4.2.2 phone the \"Login\" button is not functional.  I tried to pull a logcat at the same time, on the 4.2.2 device but there weren\'t any relevant entries in the log.  I hope there is an easy fix for 4.2.2, the app is much nicer to use than the mobile website.
reviews.author: Mike Walker

reviews.title: Not working on Nexus 4
reviews.comment: The app is a bit sluggish on my wife\'s phone (mytouch 4g) but doesn\'t even log in on my Nexus 4. I can still get to the ecofactor website through the phone\'s browser and that works fine. Very glad the developer is working on this app and looking forward to full functionality.  Update 5/13/2013: Still doesn\'t work on the N4.  Update 6/13/2013: Still doesn\'t work on the N4.
reviews.author: Andres Claros

reviews.title: No go in Jelly Bean 4.2
reviews.comment: Functional though a little sluggish in ICE and JB 4.1. However, login button doesn\'t work in JB 4.2.  Would love to see a widget eventually and quick away presets (1hr, 2hr, 4hr, 8hr...)
reviews.author: Steven James

reviews.title: TERRIBLE
reviews.comment: This app controls Nevada Energys mPowered thermostats which was just bought out by Berkshire Hathaway. You need to invest a couple dollars in an app that really works, not a beta app understand Warren Buffett?
reviews.author: Tim Puckett

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: They tell you it is ready to go until you get the thermostat installed. When I called for help I was told to unistall the app and try again in a week or two. Maybe you should actually get everything ready before you roll it out.
reviews.author: Diane Dillamon

reviews.title: Really good
reviews.comment: Works perfect on my motorola electrify. only two-three second delay from me inputting the temp for the thermostat to change.Very useful, especially when I\'m gonna be out long or on trips.
reviews.author: Roy Torres

reviews.title: Login button failure
reviews.comment: Login button does not work on galaxy s2 (d710) running 4.2.2 jellybean (cyanogenmod10.1). App unusable
reviews.author: Matt Green

reviews.comment: Don\'t work on 4.2 what do we need to be like IOS running old stuff to make apps work
reviews.author: Mike Berardi

reviews.title: Isn\'t allowing login on S4
reviews.comment: Worked on note 2. Got new phone and app doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Jonathon Akin

reviews.comment: Works fine on my HTC Evo phone, but the login button doesn\'t work on my Nexus 7 tablet.
reviews.author: Shane Gammon

reviews.comment: Get your Sh@#t together and provide the much needed updates for android users!!!!\tGet your Sh%# together and provide the much needed updates for android users!!!!
reviews.author: Henri Sagalow

reviews.title: Can\'t log in
reviews.comment: Can\'t log in my Galaxy Nexus 4.2. Work great in my Note 2. Hope they fix for 4.2 soon.
reviews.author: tony lin

reviews.title: HTC Amaze (4.1) & NEXUS 7 (4.3) & Galaxy S4 (4.2.2)
reviews.comment: Works well on the HTC Amaze.  I like that I do not need to log in each time.     On the Nexus 7 (AOS 4.2.2) tablet its a no go. Cannot get past the login screen.  So still some work to be done.   Update 7/15: On the new Galaxy S4 now and cant log in just like the tablet.    Seems its an issue with the AOS 4.2.2   Update: 9/1 Does not support for AOS 4.3 :\'(  it shouldn\'t take this long to fix, and yes I have a report in to customer service.
reviews.author: Myke Batt

reviews.comment: Seriously wtf is the hold up on s4 compatibility.   It can\'t be that difficult.\tReally,   the galaxy s4 is one of the most popular android platforms.   Get with it
reviews.author: Matthew Cochran

reviews.title: Will not log in.
reviews.comment: Will not work/log in on Galaxy S4.  Worked fine on HTC Sensation.
reviews.author: Pamela Doherty

reviews.title: No Bueno
reviews.comment: The \"Log In\"  button is inoperative on the Samsung Galaxy Note.  After following suggestions to un-install then re-install I can attest to the fact that doing so will not make the button work. Not even after three evolutions of installs and un-installs.  Anything more than that will just be insane.
reviews.author: Far\'d Thomas

reviews.title: No Connection
reviews.comment: Not consistent. What\'s the point if I can\'t adjust the temp wirelessly? Needs improvement with wireless connection. Otherwise, it would have been perfect.
reviews.author: Jean Tolentino

reviews.title: Please fix!!!
reviews.comment: Would be a nice concept if it will work for the samsung galaxy s4. Please fix!!!  Update Just read some reviews and seem like app doesnt work for the samsung galaxy s4. This is one of the latest and powerful smart phones so please FIX IT!
reviews.author: cristobal banayat

reviews.title: Annoying
reviews.comment: The login button still doesn\'t work on my S4... This has been a problem for a while and still is not fixed
reviews.author: Michael Moats

reviews.title: Bad app
reviews.comment: Why can\'t I log in?? If this is suppose to be s smud app, how com it doesn\'t say Smud? Uninstalling the piece of crap.
reviews.author: Lizzy Poo
